title: Pasta Alfredo
instructions: Cook the pasta. Heat the cream and mix with cheese. Combine and serve hot.

title: Guacamole
instructions: Mash the avocados, add lime juice, chopped onion, and salt. Mix well and serve.

title: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain. In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in flour until smooth. Gradually whisk in milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and stir in cheese until melted. Add macaroni and stir to coat.

title: Homemade Granola
instructions: Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C). In a large bowl, combine oats, nuts, salt. In another bowl, whisk honey, oil, and vanilla. Pour wet ingredients over dry and mix well. Spread onto a baking sheet and bake for 20–25 minutes, stirring halfway through.

title: Fruit Gelatin Dessert
instructions: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Stir in cold water. Let sit for a few minutes to cool slightly, then stir in fruit. Pour into a mold or serving dish. Refrigerate until set, about 4 hours.

title: Classic Hamburger
instructions: Form beef into 4 patties. Season with salt and pepper. Grill over medium-high heat for 4–5 minutes per side or until cooked to desired doneness. Assemble burgers with buns, toppings, and sauces of your choice.

title: Easy Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate and let cool slightly. Beat egg yolks with sugar until thick. Stir in melted chocolate and vanilla. Whip cream until soft peaks form and fold into chocolate mixture. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form and fold in. Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

title: Fluffy Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Make a well in the center and pour in milk, egg, and melted butter; mix until smooth. Heat a lightly oiled griddle or pan over medium-high heat. Pour batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Cook until bubbles appear, flip, and cook until golden brown.
